<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs=""
>
[Darkvision Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

After you drink this elixir, your sight becomes sharper in darkness. You gain darkvision for the listed duration.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>
Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"

>
Darkvision Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 11 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 1 hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Darkvision Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 24 hours.
name: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)
